hero.title: Premium Eyewear For Your Digital Lifestyle
hero.subtitle: Discover our exquisite collection of designer frames and lenses crafted for modern life

services.title: Available Services
services.subtitle: Experience our premium eye care and customization services
services.eyeExamDesc: Comprehensive eye health evaluation by certified professionals
services.lensOptionsDesc: Wide range of lens types from blue light filtering to progressive
services.stylingDesc: Personal styling consultation to find frames that complement your features
services.deliveryDesc: Quick shipping and hassle-free delivery to your doorstep

virtual.title: Virtual Try-On Technology
virtual.tryOnLabel: Try frames on your face in real-time
virtual.bullet1: See frames on your face before purchase
virtual.bullet2: Access from any device with a camera
virtual.bullet3: Compare multiple styles side by side
virtual.bullet4: Share with friends and family for opinions

partners.title: Our Brand Partners
partners.description: At Lens Optique, we use only the highest quality materials and partner with leading lens manufacturers to create eyewear that's both beautiful and functional.
partners.qualityDescription: Every frame undergoes rigorous testing to ensure durability, comfort, and perfect fit for daily wear.
partners.materialsDescription: We use hypoallergenic acetate, titanium, and sustainable materials that are lightweight yet incredibly durable.
partners.brandsDescription: Our lenses are crafted by world-renowned manufacturers ensuring perfect optical clarity and protection.

customSunglasses.title: Customized Sunglasses
customSunglasses.subtitle: Design your perfect sunglasses with personalized tint options
customSunglasses.description: Express your unique style with our customizable sunglasses. Choose from a variety of frame styles and add your preferred tint color to create the perfect look for any occasion.
customSunglasses.gradientDescription: Create a sophisticated look with our gradient tinting options, transitioning from darker at the top to lighter at the bottom.
customSunglasses.fullTintDescription: Choose a consistent tint throughout the lens for maximum color effect and style impact.
customSunglasses.polarizedDescription: Add polarization to reduce glare and enhance visual clarity, perfect for driving and outdoor activities.

colors.brown: Brown - Enhances contrast and depth perception
colors.grey: Grey - Preserves natural colors while reducing brightness
colors.green: Green - Provides excellent contrast in varied light conditions
colors.blue: Blue - Creates a cool appearance while reducing yellow light
colors.rose: Rose - Improves visibility in low-light conditions
colors.yellow: Yellow - Enhances visual acuity in hazy or foggy conditions

contactLenses.title: Contact Lenses
contactLenses.subtitle: Premium contact lenses for comfort and clarity
contactLenses.description: Discover our selection of high-quality contact lenses designed for all-day comfort and exceptional visual clarity. We offer daily, bi-weekly, and monthly options to suit your lifestyle.
contactLenses.dailyDescription: Fresh lenses every day for maximum comfort and convenience, ideal for occasional wearers or those with allergies.
contactLenses.biweeklyDescription: Durable lenses that provide excellent value while maintaining comfort for up to two weeks of wear.
contactLenses.monthlyDescription: Long-lasting lenses with advanced moisture technology for extended comfortable wear.
contactLenses.specialtyDescription: Solutions for astigmatism, presbyopia, and multifocal needs with cutting-edge lens technology.
contactLenses.coloredDescription: Enhance or completely change your eye color with our range of natural-looking colored lenses.
contactLenses.examDescription: Our specialists will determine the perfect fit for your eyes and lifestyle with a comprehensive contact lens examination.

ordering.title: How to Order Your Perfect Glasses
ordering.subtitle: Our simple 4-step process makes ordering custom glasses online easy and convenient

step1.title: Choose Your Frames
step1.description: Browse our collection and select the frames that match your style and preferences.

step2.title: Select Lens Type
step2.description: Choose from single vision, progressive, bifocal, or specialized lenses with optional coatings.

step3.title: Upload Prescription
step3.description: Easily upload your prescription or select 'send later' if you need more time.

step4.title: Customization Options
step4.description: Add lens tinting, anti-reflective coating, blue light filtering, or other special features.

locations.title: Visit Our Store
locations.subtitle: Experience our luxury eyewear collection at our boutique in Tangier

testimonial1.text: These glasses have changed how I work. The blue light filtering has eliminated my eye strain completely.
testimonial1.author: Sarah Johnson

testimonial2.text: The virtual try-on feature saved me so much time. I found my perfect pair on the first try!
testimonial2.author: Michael Chen

testimonial3.text: Outstanding quality and amazing customer service. My new glasses arrived perfectly fitted.
testimonial3.author: Emma Rodriguez
